title: Data Collecting Session Meta Data
description: The format for the meta data associated with a data collecting session

id.description: A UUID tagging this particular session

timestamp.description: Double precision floating point number representing seconds since UNIX epoch when the session started

hostname.description: The name of the server that is running this session

process_name.description: The name of the script or binary that took the data

commit_id.description: The hash of the last revision the of the git repository the process source code was committed to
